properties.title: Cover
properties.style: width:100%;height:100%;margin:0;vertical-align:middle;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;

children.value: We exhibited our installation of collaborative drawing for the Afterwork organised by one of the
of Lyon (Old Town). We projected on a wall right next to the bar to mix aperitif and drawing with the audience and attracted many passers-by.
